name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-meetings-stage-view-csharp
title: Meetings Stage View
shortDescription: This sample app demonstrates how to enable and configure applications for Microsoft Teams meetings, allowing users to interact with a shared meeting stage using the Live Share SDK.
longDescription: This sample application showcases how to integrate a shared meeting stage in Microsoft Teams, enabling real-time collaboration and interaction through the Live Share SDK. It provides features like a meeting side panel and customizable themes, enhancing user engagement during meetings.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing meetings stage view

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
